category.name: Test for Follows(*), Parent(*), Modifies, Uses,pattern

id.comment: Which variable(s) is/are modified by statement 1?

query.querystr: variable v; Select v such that Modifies(1, v);

id.comment: Which variable(s) is/are modified by a statement?

query.querystr: variable v;stmt s; Select v such that Modifies(s, v);

id.comment: Which variable(s) is/are modified in an assignment?

query.querystr: variable v;assign a; Select v such that Modifies(a, v);

id.comment: Which variable(s) is/are modified?

query.querystr: variable v; Select v such that Modifies(_, v);

id.comment: Which variable(s) is/are modified in while loop?

query.querystr: while w;variable v; Select v such that Modifies(w, v);

id.comment: Which statement modifies variable q?

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Modifies(s,"e");

id.comment: Which while statement modifies variable z?

query.querystr: while w; Select w such that Modifies(w,"i");

id.comment: Which assignment modifies variable b?

query.querystr: assign a; Select a such that Modifies(a,"f");

id.comment: Which assignment modifies variable vcz?

query.querystr: assign a; Select a such that Modifies(a, "vcz");

id.comment: Select all while if there exists a Modifies relationship.

query.querystr: while w; Select w such that Modifies(_,_);

id.comment: Select all variables modified in statement 6.

query.querystr: variable v; Select v such that Modifies(6,v);

id.comment: Which variable(s) is/are used by statement 3?

query.querystr: variable v; Select v such that Uses(16, v);

id.comment: Which variable(s) is/are used by a statement?

query.querystr: variable v;stmt s; Select v such that Uses(s, v);

id.comment: Which variable(s) is/are used in an assignment?

query.querystr: variable v;assign a; Select v such that Uses(a, v);

id.comment: Which variable(s) is/are used?

query.querystr: variable v; Select v such that Uses(_, v);

id.comment: Which statement uses variable f?

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Uses(s,"f");

id.comment: Which while statement uses variable i?

query.querystr: while w; Select w such that Uses(w,"i");

id.comment: Which assignment uses variable a?

query.querystr: assign a; Select a such that Uses(a,"e");

id.comment: Which assignment Uses variable vcz?

query.querystr: assign a; Select a such that Uses(a, "vcz");

id.comment: Select all while if there exists a Uses relationship.

query.querystr: while w; Select w such that Uses(_,_);

id.comment: Which is the assignment that modifies c?

query.querystr: assign a; Select a pattern a("c",_);

id.comment: Which is the assignment that modifies some variables?

query.querystr: assign a; Select a pattern a(_,_);

id.comment: Which is the assignment that d = a?

query.querystr: assign a; Select a pattern a("d","a");

id.comment: Which is the assignment that modifies z uses z?

query.querystr: assign a; Select a pattern a("z",_"z"_);

id.comment: Which is the assignment that modifies c uses x?

query.querystr: assign a; Select a pattern a("c",_"x"_);

id.comment: Which is the assignment that modifies c uses 1?

query.querystr: assign a; Select a pattern a("c",_"1"_);

id.comment: Which is the assignment that z = 10?

query.querystr: assign a; Select a pattern a("z","10");

id.comment: Which is the assignment that has expression a?

query.querystr: assign a; Select a pattern a(_,"a");

id.comment: Which is the assignment that has expression q?

query.querystr: assign a; Select a pattern a(_,_"1"_);
